channel.description: Recent content in arkansas on Places

item.title: Bentonville, Arkansas
item.description: For all our shared photos while in Arkansas, see our Photo Gallery at /places/gallery/ar Northwest Arkansas – There’s a Whole Different Thing Going On Whatever picture you have in your head about Arkansas– throw it out. Especially if your first foray into the state is anywhere along the Interstate 49 corridor that comprises Northwest Arkansas– a.k.a. NWA for short. If you are familiar with retail, you probably know that Bentonville is the headquarters and home office of Walmart, the Fortune 1 company (note: Fortune 1 – not Fortune 100) that employs a 2.

item.title: Conway, Arkansas
item.description: For all our shared photos while in Arkansas, see our Photo Gallery at /places/gallery/ar Friendly People, Fabulous Names OK, so right off the top, let me jump into a couple observations about Arkansas: Friendly People. Call it Southern courtesy, or simply good manners– whatever you want– but compared to Western states, it was very noticeable how friendly people are in Arkansas. And it goes beyond the “yes ma’am” or “yes sir” etiquette.
